q: `` Simon Cowell is the boss of this show. He gets what he wants and he wants Cheryl. The money you make on American TV is huge, but there's also a huge risk.'' The way American contracts are gives Fox the chance to opt out if viewers don't take to her. But Simon Cowell won't let that happen. `` As soon as it's announced she's going to be a judge the plan will be to launch her music career in the States.'' This has been the heart of the problem in Detroit,'' said Sergio Marchionne , who also heads up Fiat. Alan Mulally said Ford has learned that it has to deal with the current reality. You have to match production to real demand and accelerate development of new products that people will want to buy, he said. ( Reuters)- Chrysler Group Chief Executive Sergio Marchionne vowed on Tuesday to keep the automaker on top of the minivan market in North America and said the company would develop a new type of minivan by 2014. We're not going to give one inch of territory in terms of our domination of( the minivan) segment, Sergio Marchionne told workers at the Windsor Assembly Plant, where the Dodge Grand Caravan and Chrysler Town& Country minivans are made.
